content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I help you today? Are you experiencing issues with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC?
Hi, I have a problem with some of my lights flickering. I think it's something electrical.
Thank you for letting me know. May I have your name, please, so I can assist you with scheduling a service appointment?
Thank you, Margaret. Can you please provide me with the address where you'd like the service?
Thank you! I'll check that address is within our service area. May I ask when would be an ideal time for us to come take a look at the electrical issue?
Actually, I'm going to have to wait to schedule. My insurance hasn't approved it yet. Is it fine if I get back in touch later?

Of course, Margaret. You can reach out to us anytime when you're ready to scheduleâ€”just let us know. If you have any questions in the meantime or if your insurance approves the work, we're here to help.
